thought: To implement the workflow, I need to define the necessary functions first: the manual trigger, the aiCompletion action to generate SQL query, the PostgreSQL action to execute the query, and the Slack action to send messages.
plan: Define the manual trigger function to start the workflow.
Define the aiCompletion action to generate SQL query based on the system and user prompts.
Define the PostgreSQL executeQuery action to run the generated query.
Define the Slack message post action to send the query results to Slack channel 'general'.
criticism: Currently, no functions are defined, so the workflow cannot run. Defining these functions is the prerequisite before implementation.
